metadata.title: CVE-2021-34825 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Quassel through 0.13.1, when --require-ssl is enabled, launches without SSLor TLS support if a usable X.509 certificate is not found on the localsystem.

criterions.comment: quassel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
